name: Rogue Along Way
description:
Rogue Along Way is a rogue-like dungeon game. You can try to use the random picked weapon, armor and buff to challenge your enemy.

Features:

RogueAlongWay is a rogue-like dungeon action game. You can try to challenge your enemies with randomly selected weapons, armor and buff.

Game features:

  - rogue-like and lots of random elements
  - A wide variety of BUFF, item and equipment
  - Unique weapons and armor
  - Randomly generated maps, treasures, monsters, boss
